src:
Real Madrid Susun Rencana Pembajakan Jadon Sancho
05 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Satu lagi rintangan datang bagi Manchester United untuk merekrut Jadon Sancho. Klub La Liga, Real Madrid diberitakan mulai menyusun rencana untuk membajak transfer sang winger ke Old Trafford.
Sejak musim panas lalu, United kerap diberitakan bakal memboyong Sancho. Mereka kekurangan stok pemain sayap kanan, dan mereka menilai Sancho akan sempurna untuk posisi tersebut.
Pada musim panas kemarin United gagal untuk mengamankan eks pemain Manchester City tersebut. Alhasil mereka berencana untuk memboyong winger 19 tahun itu di akhir musim nanti.
The Daily Mail melansir bahwa langkah United untuk merekrut Sancho bakal menemui kendala besar. Pasalnya Real Madrid sudah memutuskan untuk mencoba menggaet sang winger.

Apa yang membuat Real Madrid ingin memboyong Sancho? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Real Madrid Develop Jadon Sancho Piracy Plans
05 Nov 2019, 15:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Another hurdle comes for Manchester United to recruit Jadon Sancho. La Liga club, Real Madrid reportedly began drawing up plans to hijack the winger's transfer to Old Trafford.
Since last summer, United are often reported to be bringing Sancho. They are short of right-wingers, and they think Sancho will be perfect for the position.
Last summer United failed to secure the former Manchester City player. As a result they plan to bring the 19-year-old winger at the end of the season.
The Daily Mail reported that United's move to recruit Sancho would face major obstacles. Because Real Madrid has decided to try to hook the winger.

What makes Real Madrid want to bring Sancho? Check out the information below.
